text: Cole Mitchell Sprouse (born August 4, 1992) is an American actor. He is the twin brother of Dylan Sprouse. He is known for his role as Cody Martin on the Disney Channel series The Suite Life of Zack & Cody and its spinoff The Suite Life on Deck. In 2017, Sprouse began starring as Jughead Jones on The CW television series Riverdale. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Twin people from the United States Category:Actors from Long Beach, California
title: Cole Sprouse
